name: Tie The Rope
description:
A Short Adventure with The Explorer and the Dog.

You are an explorer who explores underground. Your doggie, DeokBae, throws you ropes. But watch out for bones!

How To:

  • [ Space Bar ] - Charge Jump. You can jump as long as you press the button.
  • [ESC] - Pause

You can play in less than 10 minutes.

Made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2023.1.

---

Brackeys (2D Mega Pack)
